TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataGridViewEditingControl

summary.span: 定义承载在 的单元格内的控件的常见功能。

span.span: Defines common functionality for controls that are hosted within cells of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口由相应的控件（如和）实现，这些控件 在处于 编辑模式时由相应的单元（例如 和 ）承载。This interface is implemented by controls, such as and , that are hosted by corresponding cells, such as and , when they are in edit mode. 可以承载编辑控件的单元格类型将其 属性设置为， 表示编辑控件类型。Cell types that can host editing controls set their property to a representing the editing control type. 单元格进入编辑模式时，将执行以下步骤：When the cell enters edit mode, the following steps are performed: 1. 控件创建编辑控件类型的实例。The control creates an instance of the editing control type. 2. 控件调用单元 方法。The control calls the cell method. 您可以重写此方法以将单元值传输到编辑控件。You can override this method to transfer the cell value to the editing control. 3. 控件调用编辑控件 方法并传入单元格的当前样式。The control calls the editing control method and passes in the cell's current style. 您可以实现此方法以初始化编辑控件的外观，使其与单元格的外观匹配。You can implement this method to initialize the appearance of the editing control so that it matches the appearance of the cell. 4. 控件调用编辑控件 方法。The control calls the editing control method. 您可以实现此方法以对编辑控件进行最后调整，例如选择控件值。You can implement this method to make final adjustments to the editing control, such as selecting the control value. 有关实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中承载控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells)。For more information about implementing , see [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells). 诸如这样的单元格类型 提供用户界面 (UI) 用于指定值，而无需承载编辑控件即可实现 接口。Cell types such as that provide a user interface (UI) for specifying values without hosting an editing control implement the interface. 如果该单元格处于编辑模式，则显示此示例中的 UI。The UI in this case is displayed regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode. 其他单元类型（如 ）提供 UI，但不存储用户指定的值。Other cell types, such as , provide a UI but do not store user-specified values. 在这种情况下，单元类型不实现 或承载编辑控件。In this case, the cell type does not implement or host an editing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个派生自的接口的实现 。The following code example provides an implementation of this interface that derives from . 此示例摘自 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中承载控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#300](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#300)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#300](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#300)]

related.span: 如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中托管控件

span.span: How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl(class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle dataGridViewCellStyle) cil managed

span.span: The to use as the model for the UI.

summary.span: 更改控件的用户界面 (UI)，使之与指定单元格样式一致。

span.span: Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，此方法的实现会将编辑控件（如字体、背景色和前景色）的 UI 属性设置为中的相应属性的值 `dataGridViewCellStyle` ，这是用于承载控件的单元格的样式。Typically, an implementation of this method will set UI properties for the editing control, such as font, background color, and foreground color, to the values of corresponding properties in the `dataGridViewCellStyle`, which is the style used for the cell hosting the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中承载控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#303)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#303)]

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器正在修改的单元格的格式化值。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatted value of the cell being modified by the editor.

value.span: 一个 ，表示单元格的格式化值。

span.span: An that represents the formatted value of the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化值表示在控件的用户界面中显示的值。The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface. 格式化值可能不同于绝对值，甚至是控件中包含的实际值的数据类型。The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中承载控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#301](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#301)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#301](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#301)]

summary.span: 获取或设置该承载单元格的父行的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the hosting cell's parent row.

value.span: 包含该单元格的行的索引; 如果没有父行，则为-1。

span.span: The index of the row that contains the cell, or -1 if there is no parent row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口未定义相应的 `ColumnIndex` 属性。The interface does not define a corresponding `ColumnIndex` property. 您可以使用 属性来检索父 控件，并使用 属性来确定活动单元格的行索引和列索引。You can use the property to retrieve the parent control and use the property to determine the row and column indexes of the active cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EditingControlValueChanged { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EditingControlValueChanged : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示编辑控件的值是否与承载单元格的值不同。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the editing control differs from the value of the hosting cell.

value.span: 如果控件的值与单元格的值不同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the control differs from the cell value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为， `true` 表示宿主单元格的状态已更改，其用户界面 (UI) 需要更新以反映值的更改。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the hosting cell's state has changed and its user interface (UI) needs to be updated to reflect this change in value. 在更新后，所属单元或表会将此属性重置为 `false` 。The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after an update.

para.span: 如果 在此属性的实现中返回，则不会自动更改显示的值。

span.span: Returning in your implementation of this property does not automatically change the displayed value.

para.span: 在编辑控件中的值发生更改时，必须 通过传递 给方法来通知更改 。

span.span: When the value changes in the editing control, you must notify the of the change by passing to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EditingControlWantsInputKey (System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, bool dataGridViewWantsInputKey);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool EditingControlWantsInputKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, bool dataGridViewWantsInputKey) cil managed
Public Function EditingControlWantsInputKey (keyData As Keys, dataGridViewWantsInputKey As Boolean) As Boolean
abstract member EditingControlWantsInputKey : System.Windows.Forms.Keys * bool -> bool

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

param.name: dataGridViewWantsInputKey
param.span: 当 要处理 中的 时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the wants to process the in ; otherwise, .

summary.span: 确定指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，还是应由 处理的特殊键。

span.span: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the should process.

returns.span: 如果指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑控件实现此方法以确定控件应处理的输入键，以及应由处理的输入键 。An editing control implements this method to determine which input keys should be processed by the control, and which input keys should be processed by the . 方法由调用 。The method is called by the . `true` `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` 当可以处理时，将传入 `keyData` 。The will pass in `true` for `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` when it can process the `keyData`. 如果编辑控件可以让 句柄，则 `keyData` `false` 在为时应 `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` 返回 `true` 。If the editing control can let the handle the `keyData`, should return `false` when `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` is `true`. 的其他实现 可能会忽略的 `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` 值 `true` ，并 `keyData` 在编辑控件中处理。Other implementations of may ignore a `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` value of `true` and handle the `keyData` in the editing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中承载控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#305](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#305)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#305](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#305)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditingPanelCursor As Cursor
public: property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ EditingPanelCursor { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当鼠标指针位于 上方但不位于编辑控件上方时所使用的光标。

span.span: Gets the cursor used when the mouse pointer is over the but not over the editing control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示用于编辑面板的鼠标指针。

span.span: A that represents the mouse pointer used for the editing panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑面板是在 控件处于编辑模式时承载编辑控件的。The editing panel is the that hosts the editing control when the control is in edit mode. 实际编辑控件可能不会涵盖编辑面板的整个区域。The actual editing control may not cover the entire area of the editing panel. 在这种情况下， 实现应返回当鼠标指针位于面板上但不悬停于控件上时要使用的光标。In this case, the implementation should return the cursor to use when the mouse pointer is over the panel but not over the control. 通常，您需要返回控件使用的相同游标。Typically, you will want to return the same cursor that the control uses. 如果要更改指针位于控件上时显示的光标，则必须设置 属性。If you want to change the cursor that appears when the pointer is over the control, you must set the property. 可以在实现的构造函数中设置此项 ，也可以在实现中设置此项 。You can set this in the constructor of the implementation, or you can set it in the implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中承载控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells)中提供的一个更大的示例。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#311](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#311)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#311](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#311)]

param.name: context
param.span: 值的按位组合，它指定需要数据的上下文。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that specifies the context in which the data is needed.

summary.span: 检索单元格的格式化值。

span.span: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示单元格内容的格式化版本。

span.span: An that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化值表示在控件的用户界面中显示的值。The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface. 格式化值可能不同于绝对值，甚至是控件中包含的实际值的数据类型。The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control. 若要设置控件的格式化值，请使用 属性。To set the formatted value of the control, use the property.

para.span: 在此方法的实现中更改返回值并不会自动更改显示的值。

span.span: Changing the return value in your implementation of this method does not automatically change the displayed value.

para.span: 在编辑控件中的值发生更改时，必须 通过传递 给方法来通知更改 。

span.span: When the value changes in the editing control, you must notify the of the change by passing to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PrepareEditingControlForEdit(bool selectAll) cil managed

param.name: selectAll
param.span: 为 ，则选择单元格的全部内容；否则为 。

span.span: to select all of the cell's content; otherwise, .

summary.span: 准备当前选中的单元格以进行编辑。

span.span: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的目的是准备控件及其内容以进行编辑。The purpose of this method is to prepare the control and its contents for editing. 例如，您可能希望将插入点放在内容的末尾，或者更改内容的对齐方式。For example, you might want to put the insertion point at the end of the contents, or change how the contents are aligned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange As Boolean
public: property bool RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示每当值更改时，是否需要重新定位单元格的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.

value.span: 如果需要重新定位单元格内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the contents need to be repositioned; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些情况下，当值发生更改时，需要重新定位单元格内容。Some situations require that cell contents reposition when the value changes. 例如，当单元格环绕文本并且内容变大时，可能需要重新定位单元格内容。For example, cell contents may need to reposition when a cell wraps text and the contents become larger.
